jobs_results.title: Swift Developer - Remote (Only Mexico)
jobs_results.description:
Orion is looking for an iOS Developer.

We want to create the ultimate listening experience for our customers and know that it starts by listening to each other. As part of the team, you‚Äôll collaborate with people of all styles, skill sets, and backgrounds to realize our vision while fostering a community where everyone feels included and empowered to do the best work of their lives.

As a Senior Mobile Applications Software Engineer, you will be responsible for the software our customers interact with daily. You will create experiences allowing users to configure their systems and control the content they listen to. You will work on our iOS app with multidisciplinary, agile teams.

What You‚Äôll Do
‚Ä¢ Create technical designs for and implement features in the iOS app.
‚Ä¢ Design and Implement framework components and integrate with various SDKs and mobile platforms.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with software engineers, PM, QA, and UX to design and deliver unique, innovative new features that delight our customers.
‚Ä¢ Participate in the team process, using Agile methodologies to adapt and continuously improve.

What You‚Äôll Need
‚Ä¢ You have significant experience programming in Swift.
‚Ä¢ You have experience using SwiftUI to declare and implement user interfaces.
‚Ä¢ You have contributed to an app that is available in the Apple App Store.
‚Ä¢ You are skilled at investigating issues and solving problems.
‚Ä¢ You have experience with common source code control systems (e.g. git).
‚Ä¢ Your written and verbal communication skills are strong.
‚Ä¢ You can communicate proficiently in English.
‚Ä¢ You have a degree in Computer Science or a related discipline OR relevant experience.
‚Ä¢ You have experience with C++, Embedded systems or bluethooth / Wifi devices

Preferred Qualifications
‚Ä¢ You may have used Swift Package Manager to integrate third-party libraries or SDKs.
‚Ä¢ You may be experienced with performance-tuning mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ You may be knowledgeable in asynchronous development, networking, or Bluetooth

If you love music, solving ambitious software problems, and doing things the right way every time, we‚Äôd like to talk to you!

jobs_results.title: Ios Developer
jobs_results.description:
STAND 8 is a global leader providing end-to-end IT solutions. We solve business problems through people, process, and technology and are looking for individuals to help us scale software projects designed to change the world.

We partner with companies across industries to provide modern skills, methodologies, and tools needed to compete in today's economy.
iOS Developer Job Description

This is an opportunity to join our team as an iOS developer. The role involves designing, building, refactoring, and releasing native apps.
Key Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ 4+ years of experience in designing, building, refactoring, and releasing native apps.
‚Ä¢ Experience in Agile/Scrum methodologies and working in Agile teams is desirable.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience with Objective-C/Swift on iOS.
‚Ä¢ Experience with TDD, pairing, code reviews, and other techniques to maintain high-quality code and resiliency.

The estimated salary for this position is $120,000 - $180,000 per year, depending on location and experience.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Team Sparq is committed to creating high-quality tech careers while helping clients accelerate their digital transformation journey. We are committed to being an inclusive workplace, maintaining a culture of equitable, diverse employment and advancement company-wide.

Why you will enjoy Mondays again:
‚Ä¢ Opportunity to collaborate with a diverse group of colleagues in a fun, creative environment
‚Ä¢ Progressive career journey and opportunity for advancement
‚Ä¢ Continuous development through training and mentorship programs
‚Ä¢ Exposure to modern technologies across various industries in an agile environment
‚Ä¢ Remote work

A Day in the Life:
‚Ä¢ Develop mobile applications for iOS platforms, leveraging Swift and/or Objective-C
‚Ä¢ Evaluate and determine the appropriate times to leverage Swift vs. Flutter for cross-platform functionality
‚Ä¢ Implement responsive WebViews within the iOS app container
‚Ä¢ Contribute to the design and development of scalable services using Java, Azure, and Kubernetes
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in a fast-paced, agile environment, working alongside a small, dynamic team of developers
‚Ä¢ Provide mentorship and technical support to team members and assist in cross-functional training initiatives
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews, ensuring best practices in code quality, security, and performance are followed

What it takes:
‚Ä¢ Ability to lead, mentor and motivate those around them
‚Ä¢ Consultative approach to successfully interact with clients
‚Ä¢ Ability to perform project oversight and execution of deliverables
‚Ä¢ Flexibility to adapt within a high-growth organization
‚Ä¢ Hunger for continuous learning and professional development
‚Ä¢ Problem solving skills to tackle business challenges
‚Ä¢ Intellectual curiosity to provide creative solutions
‚Ä¢ Full understanding of the software development life cycle
‚Ä¢ Ability to positively impact members in the development center and local communities through effective leadership, presentations, coaching, etc.
‚Ä¢ Desire to work in a team environment
‚Ä¢ Good interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills

Equal Employment Opportunity Policy: Sparq is proud to offer equal employment opportunity without regard to age, color, disability, gender, gender identity, genetic information, marital status, military status, national origin, race, religion, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other legally protected characteristic.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
As an iOS Developer at Axented, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our iOS applications. You will work closely with our cross-functional teams to create innovative and user-friendly apps that will enhance the overall experience for our customers.

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in iOS app development.
‚Ä¢ Proficient in Swift, Objective-C, and Xcode.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of iOS frameworks including UIKit, Core Data, and Core Animation.
‚Ä¢ Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of clean coding principles and design patterns.
‚Ä¢ Ability to troubleshoot and debug complex issues.
‚Ä¢ Excellent time-management and organizational skills.
‚Ä¢ Self-motivated and able to work independently as well as in a team environment.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Design and develop high-quality iOS applications.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
‚Ä¢ Fix bugs and improve app performance.
‚Ä¢ Continuously research and implement new technologies to enhance app functionality.
‚Ä¢ Maintain high coding standards and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Keep up to date with the latest iOS development trends and techniques.
‚Ä¢ Conduct thorough testing to ensure app functionality and user satisfaction.
‚Ä¢ Stay organized and effectively manage multiple projects at once.
‚Ä¢ Work independently and as a part of a team to achieve project goals.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer SRR & SR Banking
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Argentina, Mexico

About us
We are Raven, a unique blend of consulting, creative and technology capabilities united with a single focus: We ideate, build, and launch new value propositions that materialize our clients' potential. Our unique approach underpins the creation of emerging propositions capable of generating or capturing new value.
We untap New Horizons. In a world that faces unprecedented challenges both from a business and market dynamics, with the increasing demand of an evolving customer and collaborator, we are the wingman of our clients to cope with their growth challenges.
Just for a Few. We support leaders and market creators to innovate commercial disruptions and accelerate growth, combining strategy, design, innovation, and technology. Many organizations preach the same promise, but only a few delivers on it. We are among those.
Global Reach. Since our inception, we have developed projects with top-tier organizations throughout Latin America and Europe. We are currently expanding beyond.
We are not a consulting Company. We work differently from traditional consultants. We are not another consulting boutique, nor we want to be. We are fast and agile as a start-up, but precise and narrow focus on delivering value to our clients.
For you. We support your professional and personal development. We provide freedom to develop and a unique work environment that rewards each member of our team professionally and personally.
Our Verticals. We organize across four business lines: Business, Experience, Growth and Tech. These business lines create a seamless and yet synergetic value proposition for our clients.
We Think to Design. We build to Sell. This is what we do, we conceive unique value propositions that then we take to market!

About you
We look for individuals who dare to challenge themselves to achieve the extraordinary. Here comes the ones who change things trying to get there faster where no one has gone. Making things happen delivering results without limits.
Here comes those who transform the present to conquer the businesses of the future, and the ones who release change through design. You must think, act, and behave with an owner's mentality that is permanently reinventing itself.
Here are those of us who want to make the imposible posible.

Our work place
You must be a natural team player and should feel comfortable working with professionals from diverse disciplines, backgrounds, and countries.
We embrace work-life balance: the well-being of our people is a priority for us.
A culture of learning and creating is promoted around the world: diversity will allow us to strengthen our impact.
We encourage innovation and disruption.
We understand that changes will occur, and that adaptability is essential to help when they do happen.
Collaboration is emphasized and rewarded.

As an iOS Developer, you will take part in the company development on multiple topics and missions, such as:
-Working closely with designers and developers, ensuring incremental and continuous value delivery
-Translating App or web interface design to code by applying best practices
-Actively participating in the systematic development of solutions
-Documenting functionalities and technical specifications of the software to be implemented/implemented
-Collaborate in defining new architectures and improving existing ones, ensuring scalability and maintainability.
-Test Automation and Code Quality: Develop unit and integration tests, and review code to ensure quality and adherence to standards.
-Optimization and Security: Enhance application performance and security, protecting sensitive data and ensuring a seamless user experience.
-Document technical decisions and maintain module and feature documentation available to the entire team.

We would like you to have:
- Understanding of user experience, design for customer satisfaction and the quality of a product or service
- Self-management, ability to learn quickly and adaptability to respond to deadlines and objectives set
- Ability to work in multidisciplinary teams with agile methodologies
- Mobile and web development language knowledge (Swift, Angular, Ionic, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, React)
- Agile Teams (Scrum or Kanban) with Responsibilities in Sprints, Feedback, and Task Estimation
- Experience in Swift development
- Use of Alamofire, MVVM+RxSwift
- Dependency injection (eg. Swinject)
- Knowledge of unit testing, at least in the domain layer
- Experience with repository management (GITHUB)
- Basic version control and branch management
- Solid knowledge of databases (MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL)
- Experience with architectural patterns such as MVVM, VIPER, and Clean Architecture, ensuring a clear separation of concerns and facilitating scalability and maintainability of applications.
- Experience with Combine and SwiftUI to structure modern applications based on declarative and reactive patterns, optimizing the code and simplifying state management

Our benefits!

üöÄ We are working on new rewards tailored to the market for 2025
üëè Your salary can be paid in USD.
üéÅ My Birthday: Afternoon off on your birthday
üöö Moving Day: we support that you can move in calmly and settle into your new home
üîé Raven Hunters: You can recommend profiles that you know and that you think can make a perfect match with our organization
üê¶‚Äç‚¨õ Raven allows you to work remotely in your country.

This offer from "Raven.inc" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 75% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Ios Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Title: iOS Developer

About Umba

We are on a mission to make banking free across Africa by providing affordable, efficient, and widely available financial services. Our goal is to empower our customers to control their financial lives.

We leverage advanced machine learning to create intelligent financial products for emerging markets where credit is not widely available. With a strong customer-centric approach, we deliver mobile banking with an exceptional user experience.

Headquartered in San Francisco and growing rapidly in Mexico, Nigeria, and Kenya, we offer a broad range of digital banking products through Android and iOS apps.

Responsibilities:

jobs_results.title: Senior Ios Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
NTT DATA strives to hire exceptional, innovative and passionate individuals who want to grow with us. If you want to be part of an inclusive, adaptable, and forward-thinking organization, apply now.

We are currently seeking a Senior iOS Developer (Remote) to join our team in Mexico City, M√©xico (MX-MEX), Mexico (MX).

How You‚Äôll Help Us:

Our clients need digital solutions that will transform their business so they can succeed in today‚Äôs hypercompetitive marketplace. As a team member in our Emerging and Immersive Technology group, you will make these digital solutions come to life. You will routinely deliver elite solutions to clients that will impact their products, customers, and services.

How We Will Help You:

Joining our Emerging and Immersive Technology group is not only a job, but a chance to grow your career. We will equip you with the skills you need to produce robust applications. Whether it is providing you with training on a new programming language or helping you get certified in a new technology, we will help you grow your skills.

Once You Are Here, You Will:
‚Ä¢ Design and build advanced applications for the iOS platform.
‚Ä¢ Design, develop and modify software systems using mathematical models to predict and measure possible outcomes.
‚Ä¢ Perform upgrades and maintenance while modifying existing software to improve performance, correct errors and allow adaptation to new hardware.
‚Ä¢ Direct software system testing, validation procedures, application and system documentation and programming to ensure normal program functioning.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams (UX, Backend, BA, Business etc.) to define, design, and ship new features.
‚Ä¢ Work with outside data sources and APIs.
‚Ä¢ Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

Basic Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ 5+ Years‚Äô experience in software application development.
‚Ä¢ 3+ Years‚Äô experience in iOS development.
‚Ä¢ 3+ Years‚Äô experience in XCode, Objective C, Swift 4, 5.
‚Ä¢ 3+ Years‚Äô experience in UIKit.
‚Ä¢ 1+ Years‚Äô experience in building MVC, MVVM, MVP architecture.
‚Ä¢ 3+ Years‚Äô experience in Rest API integrations.
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs Degree or equivalent combined work and education experience.

Preferred:
‚Ä¢ Experience in Cocoa framework.
‚Ä¢ Experience with various UI/UX designs.
‚Ä¢ Experience with offline storage such as SQLite, Core Data, Realm.
‚Ä¢ Experience in UI components like Core Animation, Auto layout, Size Classes, SnapKit.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications.
‚Ä¢ Experience Building and deploying the application and post-production Support.
‚Ä¢ Experience working in Agile and DevOps model.

Ideal Mindset:
‚Ä¢ Lifelong Learner. You are always seeking to improve your technical and nontechnical skills.
‚Ä¢ Team Player. You are someone who wants to see everyone on the team succeed and is willing to go the extra mile to help a teammate in need.
‚Ä¢ Listener. You listen to the needs of the customer and make those the priority throughout development.

Applications should include a resume.

About NTT DATA

NTT DATA is a $30 billion trusted global innovator of business and technology services. We serve 75% of the Fortune Global 100 and are committed to helping clients innovate, optimize and transform for long-term success. As a Global Top Employer, we have diverse experts in more than 50 countries and a robust partner ecosystem of established and start-up companies. Our services include business and technology consulting, data and artificial intelligence, industry solutions, as well as the development, implementation and management of applications, infrastructure and connectivity. We are one of the leading providers of digital and AI infrastructure in the world. NTT DATA is a part of NTT Group, which invests over $3.6 billion each year in R&D to help organizations and society move confidently and sustainably into the digital future.

NTT DATA endeavors to make accessible to any and all users. If you would like to contact us regarding the accessibility of our website or need assistance completing the application process, please contact us at

This contact information is for accommodation requests only and cannot be used to inquire about the status of applications. NTT DATA is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.

jobs_results.title: Sr iOS Developer with Swift & GraphQL
jobs_results.description:
We are a digitally native technology services company where innovation, design and engineering meet scale. We use some of the latest technologies in the digital and cognitive field to empower organizations in every aspect.

Right now, we are looking for iOS Developers to join our team at Globant!
This Studio builds and evolves Mobile Applications, from inception to release in Stores, partnering with our client teams always looking for 5-star ratings.

You will get the chance to:
‚Ä¢ Work with professionals who have created some of the most revolutionary solutions in their fields.
‚Ä¢ Make an impact. Work in large-scale projects globally.
‚Ä¢ Develop your career in our Studios. Each Studio represents deep pockets of expertise on the latest technologies and trends and delivers tailored solutions focused on specific challenges.
‚Ä¢ Develop your career within an industry or multiple industries.
‚Ä¢ Be empowered to choose your career path: we have more than 800 simultaneous projects, so you can choose where and how to work.
‚Ä¢ Be part of an agile pod. Driven by a culture of self-regulated teamwork, each team -or POD- works directly with our customers with a full maturity path that evolves as they increase speed, quality and autonomy.

What will help you succeed:
‚Ä¢ 4+ Years of experience working with native iOS development (Cocoa Touch).
‚Ä¢ Good understanding of SOLID principles.
‚Ä¢ Solid Swift language knowledge, theoretical and practical.
‚Ä¢ Good understanding of iOS architecture, patterns and open-sourcers libraries.
‚Ä¢ Clean Architecture and good understanding of basic architectural patterns (MVC, MVP, MVVM).
‚Ä¢ A basic knowledge of unit test processes with iOS SDK.
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of HIG‚Äôs (Human Interface Guidelines) for iOS.
‚Ä¢ Develops across the entire app life cycle -concept, design, build, deploy, test, release to App Store and support.
‚Ä¢ Proficient in Scrum/Agile methodologies.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of CI/CD.
‚Ä¢ BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience/skills.
‚Ä¢ Objective-C experience is a plus!
‚Ä¢ Previous experience in leading teams.
‚Ä¢ Experience on MacOS and WacthOS.
‚Ä¢ Experience of Cloud (AWS, GCP or Azure).
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of high level architecture patterns (VIPER, VIP, Clean, etc.) is a plus!
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of new technologies i.e.: SwiftUI, Combine, SwiftPM, Swift Binary Frameworks, etc., is a plus

At Globant we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment makes us stronger. We encourage people to have an inclusive spirit as our global footprint expands. We seek to generate a place of inspiration and growth for everyone. A safe space, based on equity as a value, where everyone's careers can be promoted and developed in the same way. There is no innovation without diversity and there is no improvement without plurality.

This job can be filled from anywhere #LI-Remote in Mexico

Are you ready?

Job Segment: Testing, Developer, Computer Science, Cloud, Engineer, Technology, Engineering

Frequently asked questions

What does Globant do?

Globant is a forward-thinking technology company that leverages cutting-edge digital-cognitive technologies to transform organizations worldwide.

What type of company is Globant?

We are a global team of over 29,000 talented professionals working with industry leaders like Google, FIFA, and Electronic Arts. We value diversity and inclusion, aiming to create equal opportunities and inclusive workplace for all Globers.

What‚Äôs it like to work at Globant?

Working at Globant is an exciting journey where we embrace change, approach challenges with confidence, and celebrate Diversity and inclusion perspectives of our team members. We prioritize kindness, not only to our colleagues but also to ourselves, humanity, and the planet. Our culture encourages thinking big, continuous innovation, striving for excellence in our work, and collaborating as a team while having fun along the way!

Why work at Globant?
‚Ä¢ Because, here you can:
‚Ä¢ BE PART of one of the most innovative companies worldwide and work in projects that matter to you and make a positive impact in the life of others.
‚Ä¢ BE ABLE to work with leading companies and boost your professional development alongside experts by choosing your career path, projects, and workplace.
‚Ä¢ DEVELOP YOUR CAREER WITH FREEDOM and flexibility to create your work-life balance.
‚Ä¢ BE APPRECIATED for having different experiences and backgrounds to enrich our team. Find diversity in the workplace and be yourself.

Can you work remotely at Globant?

At Globant, each team has the autonomy to decide how they want to work, whether remotely, in-office, or in a hybrid model. We give flexibility to our Globers so they can have the work-life balance they desire while generating and fostering engagement within our teams, whether virtual or in-person.

What are the benefits of working at Globant?
‚Ä¢ At Globant, you get a series of benefits that make your life easier, like:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Life insurance and premium healthcare coverage for the family group, including your pets.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Work from anywhere, on-site at our award-winning offices or remotely from home, or wherever you choose in any country we operate.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Relocation possibilities in any country we operate.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Globant Campus with hundreds of courses to improve your skills and invest in your personal growth.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Employee Stock Purchase Program to invest in Globant stocks at an exclusive discount.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Employee Assistance for personal finances, legal issues, and mental health support.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Paid time off and a special Be Kind Day that you can take when you need to dedicate time to your well-being.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Parenting program with extended paternity, maternity, and adoption leaves, childcare expenses support, and fertility coverage.

Does globant work with staffing agency?

Please note that we do not accept unsolicited 3rd-party resumes.
